languages.text: {n}Респиратор Паскаля издает тихое шипение, и техножрец вкрадчиво произносит:{/n} "Алхимический состав данной субстанции мне знаком. Но никогда прежде я не сталкивался со столь необычным способом ее использования. Изысканный путь мученичества во славу {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Респиратор Паскаля издает тихое шипение, и техножрец вкрадчиво произносит:{/n} "Алхимический состав данной субстанции мне знаком. Но никогда прежде я не сталкивался со столь необычным способом ее использования. Изысканный путь мученичества во славу Омниссии".

languages.text: {n}Pasqal's respirator hisses quietly, and he says in an insinuating tone,{/n} "The alchemical composition of this substance is known to me. But never before have I come across such an unusual application. An exquisite path of martyrdom in honour of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}Респиратор Паскаля издает тихое шипение, и техножрец вкрадчиво произносит:{/n} "Алхимический состав данной субстанции мне знаком. Но никогда прежде я не сталкивался со столь необычным способом ее использования. Изысканный путь мученичества во славу {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pascal's respirator hisses quietly, and he says in an insinuating tone,{/n} "The alchemical composition of this substance is known to me. But never before have I come across such an unusual application. An exquisite path of martyrdom in honor of the Omnissiah."

{n}Pascal's respirator hisses quietly, and he says in an insinuating tone,{/n} "The alchemical composition of this substance is known to me. But never before have I come across such an unusual application. An exquisite path of martyrdom in honor of the Omnissiah."

{n}Pascal's respirator hisses quietly, and he says in an insinuating tone,{/n} "The alchemical composition of this substance is known to me. But never before have I come across such an unusual application. An exquisite path of martyrdom in honour of the Omnissiah."

{n}Pascal's respirator hisses quietly, and he says in an insinuating tone,{/n} "The alchemical composition of this substance is known to me. But never before have I come across such an unusual application. An exquisite path of martyrdom in honour of the Omnissiah."

{n}Pasqal's respirator hisses quietly, and he says in an insinuating tone,{/n} "The alchemical composition of this substance is known to me. But never before have I come across such an unusual application. An exquisite path of martyrdom in honour of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的呼吸器嘶嘶作响，以含蓄的语气开了口。{/n}“这种物质的炼金成分我很了解，但我之前从来都不清楚如此不同寻常的使用方式。{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}在上，这真是一条精致的殉道之路啊。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's respirator hisses quietly, and he says in an insinuating tone,{/n} "The alchemical composition of this substance is known to me. But never before have I come across such an unusual application. An exquisite path of martyrdom in honour of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的呼吸器嘶嘶作响，以含蓄的语气开了口。{/n}“这种物质的炼金成分我很了解，但我之前从来都不清楚如此不同寻常的使用方式。{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}在上，这真是一条精致的殉道之路啊。”

languages.text: {n}El respirador de Pasqal sisea levemente, y el tecnosacerdote añade con tono insinuante:{/n} «La composición alquímica de esta sustancia me resulta familiar, aunque nunca he visto que se usara de esta forma. Toda una demostración de martirio en honor al {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's respirator hisses quietly, and he says in an insinuating tone,{/n} "The alchemical composition of this substance is known to me. But never before have I come across such an unusual application. An exquisite path of martyrdom in honour of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El respirador de Pasqal sisea levemente, y el tecnosacerdote añade con tono insinuante:{/n} «La composición alquímica de esta sustancia me resulta familiar, aunque nunca he visto que se usara de esta forma. Toda una demostración de martirio en honor al {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}».

languages.text: {n}パスカルの呼吸器が静かにうなり、何かをほのめかすように告げる。{/n}「この物質の錬金術的な組成は自分もよく知っていますが、これほど珍しい使い方をされたのは初めて見ました。{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}に捧げる殉教の道もなかなかに険しいですな」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's respirator hisses quietly, and he says in an insinuating tone,{/n} "The alchemical composition of this substance is known to me. But never before have I come across such an unusual application. An exquisite path of martyrdom in honour of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの呼吸器が静かにうなり、何かをほのめかすように告げる。{/n}「この物質の錬金術的な組成は自分もよく知っていますが、これほど珍しい使い方をされたのは初めて見ました。{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}に捧げる殉教の道もなかなかに険しいですな」

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Atemgerät zischt leise, und er sagt in bedeutungsvollem Ton:{/n} "Ich kenne die alchemistische Zusammensetzung dieser Substanz. Aber eine derart ungewöhnliche Anwendung dafür ist mir noch nie untergekommen. Ein exquisites Märtyrertum zu Ehren des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's respirator hisses quietly, and he says in an insinuating tone,{/n} "The alchemical composition of this substance is known to me. But never before have I come across such an unusual application. An exquisite path of martyrdom in honour of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Atemgerät zischt leise, und er sagt in bedeutungsvollem Ton:{/n} "Ich kenne die alchemistische Zusammensetzung dieser Substanz. Aber eine derart ungewöhnliche Anwendung dafür ist mir noch nie untergekommen. Ein exquisites Märtyrertum zu Ehren des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

languages.text: {n}Le respirateur de Pasqal siffle doucement, et il avance d'un ton riche en sous-entendus :{/n} « Je connais la composition alchimique de cette substance, mais c'est la première fois que je la vois utilisée comme ça. Un délicieux chemin menant au martyre en l'honneur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's respirator hisses quietly, and he says in an insinuating tone,{/n} "The alchemical composition of this substance is known to me. But never before have I come across such an unusual application. An exquisite path of martyrdom in honour of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le respirateur de Pasqal siffle doucement, et il avance d'un ton riche en sous-entendus :{/n} « Je connais la composition alchimique de cette substance, mais c'est la première fois que je la vois utilisée comme ça. Un délicieux chemin menant au martyre en l'honneur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. »

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın solunum maskesi sessizce tıslıyor. İmalı bir ses tonuyla konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu maddenin simyasal bileşimine vakıfım. Ancak ilk kez böyle sıra dışı bir şekilde kullanıldığına tanık oluyorum. {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g} uğruna şehit olmanın enfes bir yolu."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's respirator hisses quietly, and he says in an insinuating tone,{/n} "The alchemical composition of this substance is known to me. But never before have I come across such an unusual application. An exquisite path of martyrdom in honour of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın solunum maskesi sessizce tıslıyor. İmalı bir ses tonuyla konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu maddenin simyasal bileşimini biliyorum. Ancak ilk kez böyle sıra dışı bir şekilde kullanıldığına tanık oluyorum. {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g} uğruna şehit olmanın seçkin bir yolu."
